brief_title: A Study of Motexafin Gadolinium for the Treatment of Relapsed or Refractory Multiple Myeloma
brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine if the drug motexafin gadolinium will be an effective treatment for patients who have relapsed or refractory multiple myeloma.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Relapsed or Refractory Multiple Myeloma - ≥ 18 years old - Able to provide consent for participation - ECOG status 0-2 Lab values: - ANC ≥ 1,000/µL - WBC count ≥ 2.0/µL - Hemoglobin ≥ 8.0 g/dL - Platelet count ≥ 50,000/µL - AST and ALT ≤ 2 x ULN - Total Bilirubin ≤ 2 x ULN - Creatinine ≤ 2.0 mg/dL and - Not pregnant or lactating
